org.deeplearning4j.arbiter.layers

Class BaseLayerSpace<L extends BaseLayer>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.deeplearning4j.arbiter.optimize.api.AbstractParameterSpace<L>
      • org.deeplearning4j.arbiter.layers.LayerSpace<L>
        • org.deeplearning4j.arbiter.layers.BaseLayerSpace<L>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ParameterSpace<L>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    FeedForwardLayerSpace

    public abstract class BaseLayerSpace<L extends BaseLayer>
extends LayerSpace<L>
    BaseLayerSpace contains the common Layer hyperparameters; should match BaseLayer in terms of features

    • Method Detail

      • numParameters

        public int numParameters()
        Description copied from interface: ParameterSpace
        Get the total number of parameters (hyperparameters) to be optimized. This includes optional parameters from different parameter subpaces. (Thus, not every parameter may be used in every candidate)
        Specified by:
        numParameters in interface ParameterSpace<L extends BaseLayer>
        Overrides:
        numParameters in class LayerSpace<L extends BaseLayer>
        Returns:
        Number of hyperparameters to be optimized

        Specified by:

        Overrides:

      • setIndices

        public void setIndices(int... indices)
        Description copied from interface: ParameterSpace
        For leaf ParameterSpaces: set the indices of the leaf ParameterSpace. Expects input of length ParameterSpace.numParameters(). Throws exception if ParameterSpace.isLeaf() is false.
        Specified by:
        setIndices in interface ParameterSpace<L extends BaseLayer>
        Overrides:
        setIndices in class LayerSpace<L extends BaseLayer>
        Parameters:
        indices - Indices to set. Length should equal ParameterSpace.numParameters()
